title: My Indigo
typeOfFood: Chinese, Japanese, Thai, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Asian fusion restaurant chain offering mixed cuisines with mainly curries, stir-fries, and sushi. Has coffee and pastries. Vegan dishes are labelled, and sometimes has vegan specials. Customers could mix-and-match elements of the main courses and choose the spicy level. This one is located within the shopping centre underneath Karlsplatz.
